1.0.1.name: wordpress/ssl-cert-tracker
1.0.1.description:
This is a simple widget style plugin to track SSL Certificate expirations. It will aquire the expiration date automatically when you enter a host name.

For now, version 1.0 is very limited. I'd like to add the following features to future releases.

  1. Allow manual date entry (for tracking non-public certs)
  2. Allow port specification for non-standard ports
  3. Allow other types of certificates to be tracked (email, code signing, etc)
